quote: There is no such thing as digital marketing. There is marketing - most of which happens to be digital.
author: Brad Jakeman, the former president at PepsiCo

quote: You don’t need a digital strategy, you need a business strategy for the digital age.
author: Judy Goldberg, ex Sony Pictures

quote: Digital marketing is no longer about merely adding online channels to the media mix; it is about integrating digital into all facets of marketing.
author: Adam Bird, Senior Partner at McKinsey&Company

quote: People ignore design that ignores people.
author: Frank Chimero, Designer

quote: Design creates culture. Culture shapes values. Values determine the future.
author: Robert L. Peters, Graphic Designer

quote: If we want users to like our software, we should design it to behave like a likeable person: respectful, generous and helpful.
author: Alan Cooper, Software Designer and Programmer

quote: If I had an hour to solve a problem and my life depended on the solution, I would spend the first 55 minutes determining the proper question to ask, for once I know the proper question, I could solve the problem in less than five minutes.
author: Albert Einstein, Theoretical Physicist

quote: Good content isn’t about good storytelling. It’s about telling a true story well.
author: Ann Handley

quote: Content is fire, social media is gasoline.
author: Jay Baer

quote: The best marketing doesn’t feel like marketing.
author: Tom Fishburne
